title: so it seems that ancient coin can be used on manaless champions (not resourceless ones though)
body:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9glh8sU6MaY

Will it get removed? support Rengar seems like a good idea if you can utilise it as the mana coin gives instant max ferocity.

Credit to Vandiril

replies.body: that instand vlad blood rush tho...

Possibly cause: Coin passive is coded to give at least 15 of the secondary resource, not 15 mana.

As Rengar only has 4 max Ferocity, 15 of the secondary resource fills him up immediately.
seems dumb to remove this. If anything, I'd hope they add it to the tooltip. Maybe lower rengar's fury thing specifically lol
Of course it will be removed, theres a video on this exploit
